title: Clip Highlights for Social Media
description: Immediately after a game, a social media manager needs to create and post highlight clips.

tasks.description: Access the full recording of the game broadcast.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has the full video file.

tasks.description: Use an AI tool to automatically identify the most exciting plays (e.g., goals, big hits).
tasks.expected_outcome: The tool generates a list of timestamps for potential highlights.

tasks.description: Create short video clips for the top 3 highlights.
Post the clips to the team's social media accounts.
